name: The Eyes of the Moon
description:
A scholar, a socialite, and a thief meet together in a private room to discuss their plan to steal the Eyes of the Moon-- an opal necklace of fantastic esoteric, aesthetic, and monetary significance. This is a short interactive fantasy heist story featuring three intertwining branches; all are necessary to complete in order to reach the ending.

The Eyes of the Moon is made in Twine, a free tool for making text-based HTML games.

Warning: Contains explicit descriptions of non-sexual bodily fluids and some foul language.
